[enviroment setup]
export NDK=/home/frank/eclipse/ndk/android-ndk-r9c
export PREBUILT=$NDK/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.6/prebuilt
export PLATFORM=$NDK/platforms/android-12/arch-arm 
export PREFIX=./out


[build: x86]
./configure --prefix=./out/x86 \
--enable-static \
--enable-pic \
--disable-cli \
--enable-lto \
--host=arm-linux \
--cross-prefix=$PREBUILT/linux-x86/bin/arm-linux-androideabi- \
--sysroot=$PLATFORM



[build: armeabi-v7a]
./configure --prefix=./out/armeabi-v7a \
--enable-pic \
--host=arm-linux \
--cross-prefix=$NDK/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.6/prebuilt/linux-x86/bin/arm-linux-androideabi- \
--sysroot=$NDK/platforms/android-12/arch-arm
